reviewText: Horns horns horns simply enjoyable. Had forgotten all about katg until I met them at Singapore and Tokyo airports. Bought this dvd went to the san diego concert. The dvd has a mix of jazz, funk, disco, the only thing that is missing is a blu ray version although this dvd is very well produced. However when you are really enjoying something you want it to be the best it can be. My highest recommendation for katg fans and others who enjoy this genre of music.
summary: Just had to get up and dance

reviewText: I own a few concerts DVD this is one of the best I have!! Excellent show, the sound with DTS and the video was awesome. I have George Benson DTS, Santana DTS and this ranks with the best.

reviewText: This cd is a let down.  I have seen Kool and the Gang live and I expected the same show from this cd, but it wasn't there.  For one thing, JT isn't there and neither is Skip, so find another live cd to watch.
summary: Not as good as it should be
Title: N/A

reviewText: Unless you're hung up on the fact that some of the founding members are not on this DVD, don't worry about the criticisms expressed by others here.  I'm going to give you a review from an avid DVD buyer and fan of bands such as Earth Wind Fire, Chicago, Tower of Power, and others.The camera work is fantastic and modern (recorded in 2001).  The sound is fantastic, with pumping drums and bass, and warm and jazzy trumpets.  EXCELLENT SOUND, and in DTS 5.1 if you want it.  That part of the DVD is ALL SET.The set list is nice and funky, with some welcome intermissions in jazz (they kind of sound like Chicago meets Earth Wind Fire in some of the songs).  I had previously only heard their "pop" funk songs, but after listening to this DVD I have a lot of respect for the new musicians of Kool & The Gang.  They got the chops.One thing: three or four members of the original crew are here, the rest of the 7-8 other musicians are new bloods whose energy and talent are great.I enjoy this DVD greatly and pop it in often.  Buy it. THIS is the Kool & The Gang DVD you want.
summary: THIS is the DVD to buy
Title: N/A

reviewText: This DVD is wonderful. The musicians are top notch and the music is spectacular! I would recommend this music concert DVD to anyone that is a fan of Kool and the Gang and even to those who may not know their music!!This band has been at it for years and they haven't lost their touch.This DVD has a combination of music from their early years to more recent years.This is Kool and the Gang at their best. So, why don't you celebrate good times with them and order this dvd.I know I didn't regret it and neither will you!!
summary: KOOL AND THE GANG CELEBRATE GOOD TIMES!
Title: N/A

reviewText: What's Kool $ the gang in concert without Funky Stuff and Fresh? You could clearly see and hear where Funky Stuff was edited on this DVD. Why chop out one of their best and well known songs? I have no idea. Anway, they did good on the lesser known songs. Let the Music Take your Mind was good. This DVD really showcased the bands talent on instruments, something they are first....musicians. I would have given it more stars if it had those two songs I mentioned.
summary: Was ok, could have been better
Title: N/A

reviewText: You can't go wrong with ordering this Kool @ the Gang dvd. If you really like soul music by an instrumental band, this is it. Kool start's the concert off with his first R@ B hits and close it out with his newer hits. This dvd puts you in the mood like actually being there at House of Blues.
summary: Kool @ the Gang - Live from House of Blues
